title: Blue Funk by Heavy D and the Boyz
description:
Blue Funk by Heavy D & The Boyz

I think this album is a Hip Hop Classic, so I post it here as it is not available anywhere in any format.

Firstly, the album was quite poorly mastered as the levels are very low on side one and even lower on the superior side two. This is my second copy so I know this to be true. I have increased the volume of each track but with professional equipment so there is absolutely no quality loss. My vinyl record is mint so the scratches you hear are purposely added by the producers.

I also include the 12 Inch mix of the classic title track Blue Funk which is the same as the album but mastered a little higher. This is the best track on the album, no question!

Mp3 Format 320 kbps & Cover Art

Enjoy this rare Classic!
